title: Mediterranean Pasta
description: This healthy Mediterranean Pasta is the breezy social butterfly of the dinner recipe crowd. So effortless! So chic! A light, easygoing mix of angel hair pasta, fresh lemon, and classic Mediterranean ingredients like tomato, Parmesan, and artichoke, this simple but splendid healthy pasta recipe can carry itself at any meal.

title: Pasta with Seafood
description: This seafood pasta is a mix of shrimp, clams, mussels and scallops, all tossed together with spaghetti in a homemade tomato sauce. An easy yet elegant meal thatâ€™s perfect for entertaining!

title: Chili Pasta
description: Fettuccine pasta with chilli sauce and spices.

title: Steak with Potatoes
description: Beef steak (150g) on the plate, with fries. Comes with rice and sauces.

title: Chopped rump steak with vegetables and pasta
description: 400g of chopped rump, with grilled vegetables and pasta chosen by the customer.

title: Vegan lasagna (soy meat)
description: 100% vegan lasagna made with soy meat and special pasta.

title: Special Salad
description: Salad with avocado, mango, lettuce, chickpeas and more.

title: Meatballs
description: Portion of meatballs with sour cream, onion and spices. Comes with rice or pasta.
